thread.title: Ferne McCann left crying with embarrassment as she's rejected by guy for Jorgie Porter on Celebs Go Dating
thread.title_full: Ferne McCann left crying with embarrassment as she's rejected by guy for Jorgie Porter on Celebs Go Dating

author: Hayley Minn
title: Ferne McCann left crying with embarrassment as she's rejected by guy for Jorgie Porter on Celebs Go Dating
text:
Ferne McCann left crying with embarrassment as she's rejected by guy for Jorgie Porter on Celebs Go Dating Harry the firefighter chose the former Hollyoaks actress over the ex-TOWIE star on the E4 show Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Ferne McCann embarrassed as Jorgie Porter asked on date by guy she wanted Share this video Get celebs   Thank you for subscribing!   
Ferne McCann was left crying with embarrassment in the first episode of Celebs Go Dating tonight, as Jorgie Porter got asked out by the guy she wanted to go on a date with. 
The former TOWIE star immediately picked firefighter Harry out at the mixer, and told receptionist Tom Read Wilson she wanted to ask him out. 
But by the time she’d plucked up the courage to tell him she fancied him, Harry had already swooped in on Jorgie and asked her out. 
And the former Hollyoaks star even thinks they’re going to Paris for their first date! Read More Harry really liked Jorgie Porter (Photo: E4) But Ferne McCann really liked Harry (Photo: E4) 
But it wasn’t meant to be for Ferne, as realising what had happened, she said: “Oh my f**king god, that’s so embarrassing!” 
She then ended up drunkenly agreeing to a date with someone else. 
But then burst into tears, saying: “I’m going to be left on the shelf!” 
However, then another guy called Kieron came over and saved her. 
She’s going on a date with him too now - so that’s two dates for Ferne! 
After agreeing to the date with Kieron, she added: “Maybe he’s my knight in shining armour?” Read More
